DownloadApp.TITLE: Download the app
DownloadApp.SUBTITLE: Available on App Store and Google Play

HowItWorks.TITLE: How it works
HowItWorks.SUBTITLE: Follow these simple steps
HowItWorks.STEP1_DESCRIPTION: Use the map to locate yourself.
HowItWorks.STEP2_DESCRIPTION: Choose from a variety of restaurants.
HowItWorks.STEP3_DESCRIPTION: Receive your order directly at home.

LoginForm.TITLE: Welcome Back!
LoginForm.SUBTITLE: Sign in to access your account
LoginForm.PASSWORD_FORMAT: Password must be at least 6 characters long and contain at least one lowercase letter, one uppercase letter, one number, and one special character.
